title: Really bad storyline and also really bad set decoration, art direction, makeups, costumes, everything is really bad except musics.
review: Just the scores are amazing but the other all things are really bad. First of all this is not even close to the true history. I was just waiting sided movie... But it is not sided on our nation. It is just sided to nothing. The movie insults Byzantium with some trues and also with some exaggeration. Also with silly way the movie insults our heros, great men, soldiers. Even the movie insults our the greatest leader... Sultan Mehmed II. Han. And also it insults his father with big lies.This is just the great way to waste of time. Just listen the original scores, they are really amazing. Thank you Benjamin Wallfisch. Curse you Faruk Aksoy.

title: Evil German Propaganda, again... WE DID UNDERSTAND THEY WERE BAD PEOPLE. SO REST OF THE WORLD IS COMING FROM HEAVEN?
review: These propaganda movies are telling us 'Germans are not humans.' and it is just silly. This movie built on a lie and real bad story. Over-rated bad movie with bad Lucas story. His good works are Star Wars and creating ILM. And Indiana Jones not one of his good works. Absolutely nonsense story.

title: Not perfect as they told.
review: The movie has real good cinematography. But it has nothing else. It is over-rated for real. This is not cult movie. Yes it is a good movie but this is absolutely not the 10th best movie.Being a two person at once is a good story actually but that's happening in our real world. Slepless nights, nonsense fighting club for solve the sleeping problems... It is just nonsense. It is not cult it is just nonsense.The characters talking about killing the capitalizm but this movie made with 63 million dollars. Real good story bro. Don't be mad about my review. This is a good movie as I sad. But not as 10th best movie. Also I mostly counted the cons about this movie because everyone talks about the good things about this movie.

Just the acting and cinematography is cool and other things are bad.Schindler's List and Pianist are in my 10 point movies. I have 20 movies that I gave a 10 point. title: Perfect work again. I wasn't expecting this...

The movie was real amazing. Dramas, future travelings, character relationships, everything was perfect. The greatest moment was absolutely Portals scene. Natasha and Tony's sacrifice was really great. All the heros were dead in first movie. That was so sad. So I didn't expect they can done better drama in this movie. But actually they've done.Now this movie has cons also. Captain America's as* jokes and fat Thor was not good actually. They thought If Thor is beat Thanos in Infinity War and we need a weaken Thor. Actually they chose a bad way I think. Thor is real old character but we are not searching logic in these movies. So 5 years without fight was enough for a weaker Thor. Thor gain my respect in Infinity War and now that fat Thor is real nonsense for me.

title: The Best Continue Movie Ever.
review: ⭐⭐⭐Screenplay: 98/100⭐⭐⭐Acting Performance: 97/100⭐⭐⭐Film Editing: 97/100⭐⭐⭐Cinematography: 99/100⭐⭐⭐Visual Effects: 97/100⭐⭐⭐Sound Effects: 98/100⭐⭐⭐Art Direction & Set Decoration: 100/100⭐⭐⭐Original Scores: 99/100⭐⭐⭐Makeup: 100/100⭐⭐⭐Costume Design: 100/100_________________________________This movie starts with a hard way to go for the Hobbits. This movie is more about war between Rohan and Isengard. Orthanc (Tower Of Isengard) is one of The Two Towers and the other one is Barad-Dur it named The Great Eye in the movies. Sauron and Saruman forces trying to defeat all of the humankind and rule the world together. There is only hope left for men: The Hobbits. Do not underestimate them. This movie has The Greatest Battle of all cinematic history. So you will see so much deaths in this movie.

Everyone needs to watch this movie to learn what happened at those times. In memory of who sacrificed their lives. Respect to Oskar Schindler.This Cinematography and Art-Direction is really unique. Also Liam Neeson is a great actor and his greatest performance is in this movie.

movie_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
title: The Journey Ends with Unique Movie.
review:
⭐⭐⭐Screenplay: 100/100⭐⭐⭐Acting Performance: 98/100⭐⭐⭐Film Editing: 99/100⭐⭐⭐Cinematography: 100/100⭐⭐⭐Visual Effects: 100/100⭐⭐⭐Sound Effects: 99/100⭐⭐⭐Art Direction & Set Decoration: 100/100⭐⭐⭐Original Scores: 100/100⭐⭐⭐Makeup: 99/100⭐⭐⭐Costume Design: 100/100_________________________________I am a big fan of Middle-earth and I know as a true fan of Middle-earth there will be no better movie. And also I know there is no better movie for a true Middle-earth fan. This movie is the best movie of the all time. This movie is the best movie of the future also. I am not talking about all of the people must love and say this movie is the best of all time.This movie is not about the war of men and orcs or any other peoples. This movie about the insignificant people versus the worlds biggest thread ever. That thread is actually unbeatable.'You did not seriously think that a hobbit could contend with the will of Sauron? There are none who can. Against the power of Mordor there can be no victory.'
  • Saruman
'Hobbits really are amazing creatures. You can learn all that there is to know about their ways in a month, and yet after a hundred years they can still surprise you at a pinch.'
  • Gandalf
Both dialogues from the first movie. One of them telling us evil side is unbeatable and the other one tells we have a Hobbit.

title: For The Freedom of Scotland.
review: ⭐⭐⭐Screenplay: 98/100⭐⭐ Acting Performance: 92/100⭐ Film Editing: 88/100⭐⭐ Cinematography: 94/100⭐⭐⭐Sound Effects: 95/100⭐⭐⭐Art Direction & Set Decoration: 96/100⭐⭐⭐Original Scores: 98/100⭐⭐ Makeup: 90/100⭐⭐⭐Costume Design: 95/100_________________________________The story telling us about the British and their ruling system. The story tells the truth about British in their language. Pay attention this movie. They killed more than 100 million people around all over the world. I'm so sad about Ireland and Scotland but they are not the only ones who have suffered. They killed, enslaved, torture but not in just Europe but also in Africa, Asia, America.I'm actually not talking about British people I'm talking about Kingdoms, Rulers, States, Governments. They are guilty but not the people are. Everyone needs to watch this movie. This is untold true story.

title: Good contents but weak logicless storyline.
review: I rated 7 because Acting, Cinematography, VFX, SFX are good but the script has logicless things. Water will never be gone from this planet. Water recycling is not a untrue thing. Did they even think about this? Even if water will be gone with some way, can it be gone in only 40 years later? It is impossible even we had The Great Nuclear War we can't see anything like this. Okey in this movie doomsday came out and all the water is gone. But wait how the cars are working? What kind of doom is this? All the waters is gone with heat or something? Then why the vaporized waters are not going back to them with rains? If the heat was a really big then how did they survived? As I sad bad story but good content.
